WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:
 
Create a new solution and project.
Create a file in the root of the solution.
Add the file to the project as a link.
Run wf2wpf.
 
The conversion will fail because the source location and destination are the same and the file cannot be replaced.
WorkItem.Summary: Copying files with the same source/destination fails

Comments.Message:
You just need to call the function to create the folder...

in bConvert_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)output(p.status)
you need to write it...
below

output("Done.");
copyProjectfiles(p);  //to copy project files to 
create_WPF_Project(); //destination folder if not exists will create
